title: bootstrap: mksyscall not in Perl
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Files mksyscall.pl and mksyscall_windows.pl in directory
"$GOROOT/src/pkg/syscall" could be rewritten in Go and added to
"$GOROOT/bin" for that can be used widely by developers that need to use
anothers system calls/functions not implemented in Go.
